Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2009 06:59AM crissy wrote: Hi Laura! I have been told that a bad cough or pneumonia could cause small nodules in the lung.  My radiologist says it's normal to see nodules smaller than 6mm.  However, if bone mets are shrinking...sit back and smile.  You're feeling good, so don't worry if they are lung mets or not. Keep living your life! Crissy
Posts.Title: Any chance tiny lung nodules are NOT mets? AnneN AnneN
